about_the_game:
Have you missed some of our themed bundles in the past and wished you could just purchase them without waiting? Well then enjoy the “Essential” bundle, containing some of our best rotating bundles in Exo Outfitters! If you have missed some in the past, here is a bundle to grab them all at once. For those of you that have been with us since the beginning, this set is a way to support System Era and future content updates for Astroneer.



This bundle includes the Vintage “Automaton” Suit and a ton of customization options for your Astroneer.

Astromancy Bundle
Crystal Ball Visor
Hocus Pocus Hat
Incantation Palette

Automaton Bundle
Vintage Suit
Reboot Visor
Sanguine Palette

EXO Tech Bundle
Control Unit Hat
Error Code Visor
Grid Lock Palette

Deep Space Diver Bundle
Guiding Lite Hat
3x3 Eye Mask
Abyss Palette

Tychomancy Bundle
Space Magic Palette
Heaven-Scent Mask
Astrolabe Hat

BONUS Vintage Bundle
Vintage Red Palette
Vintage Emblem Visor

DISCLAIMER:
If you have previously purchased any of the individual items in the bundle, you will receive the value of the individual items in a QBIT grant automatically within the game for use on future Exo Outfitters purchases! The Vintage set has no QBIT value.
detailed_description:
Have you missed some of our themed bundles in the past and wished you could just purchase them without waiting? Well then enjoy the “Essential” bundle, containing some of our best rotating bundles in Exo Outfitters! If you have missed some in the past, here is a bundle to grab them all at once. For those of you that have been with us since the beginning, this set is a way to support System Era and future content updates for Astroneer.



This bundle includes the Vintage “Automaton” Suit and a ton of customization options for your Astroneer.

DISCLAIMER:
If you have previously purchased any of the individual items in the bundle, you will receive the value of the individual items in a QBIT grant automatically within the game for use on future Exo Outfitters purchases! The Vintage set has no QBIT value.
name: ASTRONEER Essential Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: X64 Quad Core CPU, 3+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online multiplayer

short_description: Have you missed some of our themed bundles in the past and wished you could just purchase them without waiting? Well then enjoy the “Essential” bundle, containing some of our best rotating bundles in Exo Outfitters!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
